casebody.data:
IRENE R. MARTIN, a widow, v. S. A. FIELDS & COMPANY, a corporation. 19 So. (2nd) 869

January Term, 1945

January 9, 1945 Division A Gorman & Hamlin, for appellant. G. E. Duncan and G. Harold Hippier, for appellee. PER CURIAM:

The only question in this appeal is the sufficiency of the evidence to sustain the decree of the chancellor. We find the evidence sufficient and the decree is affirmed.

CHAPMAN, C. J., TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
